title: Classic Cuts & Fades
summary: Precision shear and clipper work with a styling finish tailored to your daily routine.
description: From executive tapers to skin fades with textured tops, every cut begins with a consultation that maps your growth patterns and lifestyle. Expect a precision cut, neck shave, hot towel finish, and styling tutorial so you can recreate the look at home.
processDescription: Every visit begins with a style consultation, precision clipper work, and a styling tutorial so you leave confident maintaining the look at home.

processSteps.title: Consult & plan
processSteps.description: We map growth patterns, cowlicks, and daily styling goals before the first snip. Your preferences go on file for next time.

processSteps.title: Precision cut & detail
processSteps.description: Clipper, shear, and razor work blend seamlessly for a fade that grows in clean. Systematic technique, consistent results.

processSteps.title: Finish & style coaching
processSteps.description: Hot towel neck shave, product recommendation, and a quick styling walkthrough so you can maintain the look between visits.
